alert.note: Alert for Buncombe; Haywood; Madison (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 16 at 8:11PM EDT until May 16 at 8:45PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: The National Weather Service in Greenville-Spartanburg has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Madison County in western North Carolina... Northeastern Haywood County in western North Carolina... Northwestern Buncombe County in western North Carolina... * Until 845 PM EDT. * At 811 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles west of Marshall, or 10 miles south of Hot Springs, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Leicester, Spring Creek, Luck, Canto, Fines Creek and Max Patch. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report damaging winds, hail, or flooding to the National Weather Service by calling toll free, 1, 800, 2 6 7, 8 1 0 1, or by posting on our Facebook page, or Tweet it using hashtag nwsgsp. Your message should describe the event and the specific location where it occurred.
